Txt_Talk_HolyShrine_2F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0120.Text: *: The Goddess biddeth thee welcome unto the Sanctum, Her most hallowed sanctuary. Here we venerate the rainbow, created by the sacred union of rain and sun.
*: It is said that the bridge of the rain's bow shall appear only to those chosen by Rubiss, our benevolent creator. They must go bearing the gifts of rain and sun in each hand.
*: Now go thee forth, and seek out both rain and sun!
*: It is said that the bridge of the rain's bow shall appear only to those chosen by Rubiss, our benevolent creator. They must go bearing the gifts of rain and sun in each hand.
*: As Our Divine Mistress did command, thou hast sought out both rain and sun... Now, let the twain meet at last!
*: Raise thy hands and receive of Her gift!
*: Make for the cape to the north-west of Rimuldar that is closest to the isle of the great fiend.
*: Hie thee now, to the citadel where dread Zoma awaits!
*: Lo, this place hath fulfilled its purpose. Thou wilt gain nothing by remaining. Now, hie thee to the citadel where dread Zoma awaits!

Txt_Talk_HolyShrine_2F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Ere thy strength be spent, hero, thou must needs turn thine energies to the continuation of thy line<--->laugh not, child! 'Tis thy duty to posterity! To all mankind!
*: Yea, there shall come a day, I fear, when the world will have need of a hero once more.
*: Until that dark day cometh, I do swear to abide here, that I might offer what assistance I am able.

Txt_Talk_HolyShrine_2F_SUB_0_VOLUME_0210.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
